address: Av. Rafael Puig Lluvina 2, Playa de las Américas 38650
why_good_fit: Legendary sunset spin sessions every Sunday all summer. Direct beachfront setting. Opens at 10 AM as breakfast bar, transforms into vibrant club after sunset. Perfect for organic house transitions.

address: Av. Rafael Puig Lluvina, 3, Costa Adeje
why_good_fit: Attracts biggest-name DJs from Spain and worldwide. Open-air venue with stunning sea views. Famous legendary Sunday sunset sessions throughout summer.

address: CC Centro costa Local 79 Torviscas Bajo Costa Adeje 38670
why_good_fit: Super chill vibe overlooking Atlantic Ocean with beautiful sunset views. Heated infinity pool. Live DJs year-round. Private VIP cabins ideal for hybrid acts.

address: Calle Londres, Centro Comercial Fañabé 1, Local 66-67, Costa Adeje 38660
why_good_fit: Iconic beach club with direct sea access and Balinese beds. Famous for popular weekend parties. Perfect sunset positioning on long sandy beach.

region: Gran Canaria - San Bartolomé de Tirajana
address: Charrán St. El Pajar 35128, Santa Agueda – San Bartolomé de Tirajana
why_good_fit: Luxury beach club with sunbeds, daybeds, and Balinese loungers. Privileged sunset views over Bay of Arguineguín. Year-round operation.
operating_hours: Summer 11 AM - 9 PM, Winter 11 AM - 7 PM

address: Calle del Mar Mediterraneo 1, Debajo del Gran Casino del Costa Meloneras 35100
why_good_fit: One of best parties in south of Gran Canaria. Regularly organizes live music and DJ events. Upscale Meloneras area with sophisticated clientele.

address: Playa de Amadores - Mogán Gran Canaria - 35130
why_good_fit: Luxury exclusive ambiance with champagne bar. Perfect chill-out vibe for sunset sessions. Year-round perfect climate. Private cabanas ideal for hybrid performances.
Low-key early evening chilled club beats perfect for organic house. Located in Melia Salinas hotel grounds. Transitions to live music guests as night falls.
Luxurious jazz club setting perfect for hybrid organic house + live music acts. Sophisticated clientele appreciates nuanced, live instrumentation. Thursday-Saturday live performances.
One of liveliest beachfront spots in Corralejo, open 9 PM - 6 AM. Excellent for extended sunset-into-night organic house sessions. Energetic atmosphere.

address: Avenida Saladar de Jandia, centro comercial Cosmo local 123, 35625 Morro del Jable
why_good_fit: DJ floor for dancing with tables and chairs for relaxation. Prime beach location in Morro Jable. Perfect for hybrid acts combining lounge areas with DJ dance floor.

address: CC Atlántico Sol, Av. Ntra. Sra. del Carmen, 1, 35660 Corralejo
why_good_fit: Modern design with two spacious rooms directly across from Corralejo Beach. Renowned for talented DJ hosts. Quality sound systems for evening performances.
